resources.string: Will start to send matching incoming SMS to the diffusion List
This is the keyword which will trigger the diffusion of the message to your diffusion list
Enter a name and a number to add to your diffusion list
Long press to select from the contacts or enter a name followed by ":" and the number to add to your diffusion list
Chose the numbers you want to activate in your diffusion list
Enter a name or a number to remove from your diffusion list
